scripts.api::build: npm run build --workspace api; npm run build-frontend --workspace api
scripts.worker::build: npm run build --workspace worker; npm run build --workspace worker
scripts.package: mkdir -p build/client; mkdir -p target; mv packages/api/dist/index.js build; mv packages/client/out/* build/client; cd build; zip -qr ../target/api.zip *
scripts.emulate-prod-locally: npm run build --workspace client; EMULATE_PRODUCTION_SERVER=true npm run start --workspace api
